title: Ricki-Lee Coulter flaunts curves during Queensland photo shoot
text:
Ricki-Lee Coulter isn't shy about flaunting what she's worked hard for.

The 33-year-old beauty shared a stunning photo to Instagram, wearing a figure-hugging one-piece black bikini as she splashed around on the white sands and crystal clear waters of Whitehaven Beach during a photo shoot.

She captioned the post: 'We travel all over the world in search of beautiful beaches when we have this right at our doorstep! Queensland... you will always be my #1,' she declared.

'Queensland... you will always be my #1': Ricki-Lee Coulter declared love for her home state, wearing a figure-hugging black bikini, on the picturesque island of Whitehaven Beach

In another snap, she is seen wearing a white one-piece Jets Swimwear bikini, as a male hairstylist used a leaf blower to add dramatic affect to her long locks.

Ricki-Lee jokingly captioned the image: 'Just a casual day in the office... with @bradmullinshair blowing me in the toilets...'

The Australia's Got Talent host spent the last few days in her home state for a photo shoot with Facon, an Aussie luxury magazine.

Having some fun: The former Australian Idol contestant joked her hairstylist was 'blowing' her in the toilets as she worked it in a white Jets Swimwear bikini during a shoot with Facon

Work it: She's not shy to flaunt what she has worked hard for

The former Australian Idol contestant has gone through a dramatic transformation in the last few years.

Talking to news.com.au in August, she joked she 'naturally has a big ass.'

'Booty goals is always the goals. I never miss booty day,' she told news site.

'That's always the thing I keep my focus on and the one thing I focus the most on.'

'I never miss booty day': She joked she naturally has a big ass and enjoys working out her derriere during gym sessions

Making a change: She dramatically lost 30 kilos almost nine years ago in a bid to get into a healthier lifestyle

'It just runs in my family. We have got hips and ass. I love it.'

Since losing 30 kilos almost nine years ago, dropping from a size 14 to an 8, she revealed the secret to enjoying a healthy lifestyle wasn’t to focus on her weight, but rather on how she feels.

During her recent gig as host of the rebooted Australia's Got Talent, she brought pre-prepared food and snacks from home during the long hours on the set.
description: Ricki-Lee Coulter isn't shy about flaunting what she's worked hard for.
